0.9.5.name: wordpress/plugins-genius
0.9.5.description:
Plugins Genius allows you to choose which plugins should be active in the frontend and in the backend. Some plugins affects only the frontend, some only the backend of Wordpress and some of them make Wordpress slow.

Now you can tune your Wordpress site, actvating plugins only where you need.

  • Author: Marco Canestrari
